text: The PlayStation VR or PSVR is a virtual reality headset for the PlayStation 4. It was developed by Sony Interactive Entertainment and released on October 13, 2016 for â‚¬399. The PlayStation Camera is needed to use the PSVR. 5 million PSVRs were sold by December 31, 2019. == Technical specifications == * Display: 1080p, RGB, OLED * Framerate: 60, 90 or 120 Hz * Latency: <80 milliseconds == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:PlayStation (brand) Category:Virtual reality
title: PlayStation VR
